Sentencas: Samarium-doped ceria (SDC) is evaluated as electrolyte materials for intermediate temperature reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs).
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film

Sentencas: The bulk resistances of cells with SDC thin-film electrolytes are 0.16 and 0.23 Omega cm(2) when operating in solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode and in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mode, respectively.
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film

Sentencas: This result suggests that the electrolyte is reduced to a greater extent in the SOEC mode.
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film

Sentencas: New Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-delta (x = 0.04, 0 and 0.04) composites are applied as hydrogen electrode for RSOCs to prevent SDC reduction.
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film

Sentencas: With the new hydrogen electrodes, the bulk resistances of the RSOCs are approximately 0.37 Omega cm(2) in both SOFC and SOEC modes, suggesting that reduction in the SDC electrolyte is successfully minimized.
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film

Sentencas: The energy dispersive X-ray mapping of the Ba element indicates that Ba cations partially transfer from the hydrogen electrode into the electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Novel Ni-Ba1+xZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.2O3-δ hydrogen electrodes as effective reduction barriers for reversible solid oxide cells based on doped ceria electrolyte thin film
